thread.title: UK video game deals: MGS5 with Ground Zeroes, Fallout 4, Guitar Hero, PS4 and Xbox One bundles
thread.title_full: UK video game deals: MGS5 with Ground Zeroes, Fallout 4, Guitar Hero, PS4 and Xbox One bundles

title: UK video game deals: MGS5 with Ground Zeroes, Fallout 4, Guitar Hero, PS4 and Xbox One bundles
text:
September 4, 2015 10:36 BST Big Boss, lead protagonist in MGS5: Ground Zeroes and The Phantom Pain. (Konami) 
This week's round-up of the best video-game deals in the UK is highlighted by Tesco offering Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain for £40 with a free digital copy of prologue chapter Ground Zeroes. Elsewhere, we have pre-order deals for Guitar Hero Live, Fallout 4, Xenoblade Chronicles X and Uncharted: The Nathan Drake Collection. Other games on this week's list include The Elder Scrolls Online on PS4, Project Cars, Devil May Cry 4's remastered edition, plus Splinter Cell: Blacklist for £10. 
There are some good PS4 and Xbox One bundles, too, particularly for the latter, for which there is a Fifa 16 bundle available for pre-order at £278.75. There are also DualShock 4 wireless PS4 controllers available for less than £35. 
Games
